channel.title: [PI] Connecting problem
channel.description:
I get this error in the CMD & my client freezes when it connects to this client: [code] Sophie's Project Rune Client 2011 ENJOY! Model cache loaded. Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 Error: T2 - 81,73,171 - 59,3279,3511 - -26,-35,-72,7,-1,16,-52,0,-1,-1,0,0,0,0,1 ,25,0,1,29,1,39,1,7,1,35,1,44,1,14,7,8,9,5,0,3,40,3,55,3,51,3,52,3,53,3,54,3,56, 0,0, Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 72961 at ItemDef.forID(ItemDef.java:231) at client.drawAttackTab(client.java:6706) at client.drawTabArea(client.java:2122) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8815) at client.processDrawing(client.java:9658) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:5145) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) [/code]
[IMG]http://i1213.photobucket.com/albums/cc465/sagi2/gettingerror.jpg[/img]
What is the problem, how can i fix?

item.title: [PI] Connecting problem
item.dc:creator: @Sagi Sagi
item.description:
@Sagi wrote:

I get this error in the CMD & my client freezes when it connects to this client:

Sophie's Project Rune Client 2011 ENJOY!
Model cache loaded.
Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36
Error: T2 - 81,73,171 - 59,3279,3511 - -26,-35,-72,7,-1,16,-52,0,-1,-1,0,0,0,0,1
,25,0,1,29,1,39,1,7,1,35,1,44,1,14,7,8,9,5,0,3,40,3,55,3,51,3,52,3,53,3,54,3,56,
0,0,
Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 72961
        at ItemDef.forID(ItemDef.java:231)
        at client.drawAttackTab(client.java:6706)
        at client.drawTabArea(client.java:2122)
        at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8815)
        at client.processDrawing(client.java:9658)
        at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108)
        at client.run(client.java:5145)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)

What is the problem, how can i fix?

Read full topic
